Name: Fourthy
About the game: A small puzzle game. The essence of the game is simple, move the numbered cubes to arrange them in ascending order from one to fifteen, having only one unoccupied sector. Difficulty increases with each sequence built. You will have to think a lot to put everything in the right order.
